column4: It appears there is a moderately negative correlation between EV charging growth and PPLT prices. It might be worthwhile to investigate factors affecting platinum prices and EV growth independently.

The correlation between EV charger growth and PPLT prices over the past 5 months is low and negative. This suggests that changes in EV charger growth are not strongly related to the prices of this metals ETF. Investors should consider other factors when analyzing metals ETFs in relation to EV trends.
The negative correlation suggests that as EV charger growth increases, the price of the PPLT ETF tends to decrease. Consider diversifying to manage risk if this trend continues.
